lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump was barely in office when he signed an executive order restricting immigration from seven Muslim-majority nations. There was not a moment to waste, he said, because any delay would allow the "bad dudes" to rush into the U.S.

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Fight Ruling Limiting Foreign Bribery Cases
